channel.title: Copy/paste error
channel.description: whenever i copy and paste a code out of a code view in tut's and topics, all of the code runs togather and i have to seperate it. am i doing something wrong???? thanks in advance

item.title: Copy/paste error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“johnl17, post:1, topic:397132”]whenever i copy and paste a code out of a code view in tut’s and topics, all of the code runs togather and i have to seperate it. am i doing something wrong???
thanks in advance[/quote]

It’s because no one here bothers to format the code properly.

If you’re using Notepad, then it’s because a new line in Windows is CR LF(carriage return, line feed) (0x0D 0x0A). However, with Mac or Linux, it’s just LF. So when Notepad encounters a LF character without a CR preceding it, Notepad just skips it all together.

Read full topic
